languages.text: {n}Тени хрипло каркают старческим голосом:{/n} "Ради чего ты ищешь его спасения? Он был дурным лидером и дурным наставником! Он погубил всех!" {n}Дребезжащая нота возмущения перерастает в праведный обличительный рык:{/n} "Он был высокомерен! Не сознавая сирости своей, он не уповал на Императора, но верил, что непобедим!" {n}Голос слабеет, становится тихим, юношеским и полным боли:{/n} "И за ошибку заплатил нашими жизнями... Это было так жестоко и больно".

{n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."

Он погубил всех!" {n}Дребезжащая нота возмущения перерастает в праведный обличительный рык:{/n} "Он был высокомерен! Не сознавая сирости своей, он не уповал на Императора, но верил, что непобедим!" {n}Голос слабеет, становится тихим, юношеским и полным боли:{/n} "И за ошибку заплатил нашими жизнями... Это было так жестоко и больно".

traits.locale_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a bad leader and bad mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation.{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of pain.{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was so cruel and painful."

languages.text: {n}Las sombras graznan con la voz ronca de un anciano:{/n} «¿Por qué buscas su redención? ¡Siempre fue un líder terrible y un mentor pésimo! ¡Nos condenó a todos!». {n}El temblor indignado se convierte en un rugido de condena justiciera:{/n} «¡Fue arrogante! Ciego a su propia afrenta, no depositó su fe en el Emperador, ¡sino que creyó ser invencible!». {n}La voz se debilita. Ahora es la de un hombre joven, suave y llena de angustia:{/n} «Y pagó su error con nuestras vidas... Fue cruel y doloroso».
languages.original_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las sombras graznan con la voz ronca de un anciano:{/n} «¿Por qué buscas su redención? ¡Siempre fue un líder terrible y un mentor pésimo! ¡Nos condenó a todos!». {n}El temblor indignado se convierte en un rugido de condena justiciera:{/n} «¡Fue arrogante! Ciego a su propia afrenta, no depositó su fe en el Emperador, ¡sino que creyó ser invencible!». {n}La voz se debilita. Ahora es la de un hombre joven, suave y llena de angustia:{/n} «Y pagó su error con nuestras vidas... Fue cruel y doloroso».

languages.text: {n}影が、不快なかすれた老人の声で話す。{/n}「なぜその男の救済を求める？そいつは今までずっと、どうしようもない指導者で、無能なメンターだった！他の者を地獄へ葬ったのだぞ！」 {n}怒りで震える声は、真っすぐ糾弾する大声へと変わる。{/n}「その男は傲慢だった！己の惨めさを知らず、皇帝に忠実でもなく、己を無敵だと信じていた」{n}声が弱くなる。やわらかく、苦悩に満ちた若い男の声に変わった。{/n}「そしてそいつは、私たちの命でその過ちの代償を払った…残酷で痛ましい判断だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."

traits.locale_text: {n}影が、不快なかすれた老人の声で話す。{/n}「なぜその男の救済を求める？そいつは今までずっと、どうしようもない指導者で、無能なメンターだった！他の者を地獄へ葬ったのだぞ！」 {n}怒りで震える声は、真っすぐ糾弾する大声へと変わる。{/n}「その男は傲慢だった！己の惨めさを知らず、皇帝に忠実でもなく、己を無敵だと信じていた」{n}声が弱くなる。やわらかく、苦悩に満ちた若い男の声に変わった。{/n}「そしてそいつは、私たちの命でその過ちの代償を払った…残酷で痛ましい判断だ」

languages.text: {n}阴影中传来了老人嘶哑的声音。{/n}“你为什么还是想救他？他一直都是个差劲的领袖，是个毫无才华的导师！都是他害死了所有人！”{n}愤怒的颤抖慢慢变成了充满正义的谴责与咆哮。{/n}“他太傲慢了！他根本不清楚自己的弱点！他不相信帝皇，自认为自己无往不利！”{n}声音变得越来越轻，变成了年轻男性柔和的声音，声音中充满了痛苦。{/n}“犯错的人是他，可付出生命代价的人却是我们……这一切都太残酷、太痛苦了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."

traits.locale_text: {n}阴影中传来了老人嘶哑的声音。{/n}“你为什么还是想救他？他一直都是个差劲的领袖，是个毫无才华的导师！都是他害死了所有人！”{n}愤怒的颤抖慢慢变成了充满正义的谴责与咆哮。{/n}“他太傲慢了！他根本不清楚自己的弱点！他不相信帝皇，自认为自己无往不利！”{n}声音变得越来越轻，变成了年轻男性柔和的声音，声音中充满了痛苦。{/n}“犯错的人是他，可付出生命代价的人却是我们……这一切都太残酷、太痛苦了。”

languages.text: {n}Die Schatten krächzen mit der heiseren Stimme eines alten Mannes:{/n} "Warum strebt Ihr nach seiner Erlösung? Er war schon immer ein grauenhafter Anführer und talentloser Mentor! Er hat alle dem Untergang geweiht!" {n}Das entrüstete Zittern steigt zu einem Brüllen rechtschaffener Verurteilung an:{/n} "Er war arrogant! Da er nichts von seiner eigenen Verdorbenheit wusste, setzte er seinen Glauben nicht in den Imperator, sondern hielt sich für unbesiegbar!" {n}Die Stimme wird schwächer. Sie ist nun die eines jungen Mannes, weich und voller Qual:{/n} "Und er hat für seinen Fehler mit unseren Leben bezahlt ... Es war grausam und schmerzhaft."
languages.original_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."

Er war schon immer ein grauenhafter Anführer und talentloser Mentor! Er hat alle dem Untergang geweiht!" {n}Das entrüstete Zittern steigt zu einem Brüllen rechtschaffener Verurteilung an:{/n} "Er war arrogant! Da er nichts von seiner eigenen Verdorbenheit wusste, setzte er seinen Glauben nicht in den Imperator, sondern hielt sich für unbesiegbar!" {n}Die Stimme wird schwächer. Sie ist nun die eines jungen Mannes, weich und voller Qual:{/n} "Und er hat für seinen Fehler mit unseren Leben bezahlt ... Es war grausam und schmerzhaft."

languages.text: {n}Les ombres s'expriment d'une voix rauque de vieillard :{/n} « À quoi bon vous démener pour le sauver ? Il a toujours été un maître cruel et un mentor incompétent ! Nous sommes tous morts par sa faute ! » {n}Le grondement indigné cède la place à un rugissement de condamnation révolté :{/n} « Son arrogance a scellé notre perte ! Aveugle à ses propres limites, il s'est cru invincible là où il aurait dû s'en remettre à l'Empereur ! » {n}La voix se radoucit. Désormais, c'est celle d'un jeune homme accablé de chagrin :{/n} « Et c'est avec nos vies qu'il a payé son erreur... Ce fut une fin cruelle et douloureuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."

Nous sommes tous morts par sa faute ! » {n}Le grondement indigné cède la place à un rugissement de condamnation révolté :{/n} « Son arrogance a scellé notre perte ! Aveugle à ses propres limites, il s'est cru invincible là où il aurait dû s'en remettre à l'Empereur ! » {n}La voix se radoucit. languages.text: {n}Gölgeler, ihtiyar bir adamın ses tonunda boğuk bir şekilde hırıldıyor.{/n} "Neden kefaretini ödemesi için uğraşıyorsun? Her zaman berbat bir lider, beceriksiz bir yönder oldu! Herkesi felakete sürükledi!" {n}Haksızlıklar karşısında öfke dolan titrek ses, güçlenip erdemli bir kınama kükreyişine dönüşüyor.{/n} "Küstahın tekiydi! Kendi perişanlığının farkında değildi. İmparator'a inanmak yerine kendisinin yenilmez olduğuna inandı!" {n}Ses kısılmaya başlıyor. Şimdi bir delikanlının yumuşak ve ızdırap dolu sesiyle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hatalarının bedelini ise canlarımızla ödedi... Gaddarca, acıyla can verdik."
languages.original_text: {n}The shadows croak hoarsely in an old man's voice,{/n} "Why do you seek his redemption? He was always a terrible leader and talentless mentor! He doomed everyone!" {n}The indignant tremble grows into a roar of righteous condemnation:{/n} "He was arrogant! Having no notion of his own wretchedness, he did not put his faith in the Emperor, but instead believed himself to be invincible!" {n}The voice grows weaker. It is now a young man's, soft and full of anguish:{/n} "And he paid for his mistake with our lives... It was cruel and painful."
